actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To amend the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 to exempt issuers with a total market capitalization of less than $2,000,000,000 from the auditor attestation requirement for internal control assessments.
short_title: Get Regulation Out of the Way Act of 2015

summary.text:
Get Regulation Out of the Way Act of 2015 or the GROW Act of 2015 

This bill amends the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 to exempt from the auditor attestation of internal control assessments an issuer of securities whose total market capitalization is less than $2 billion.

titles.title: Get Regulation Out of the Way Act of 2015
To amend the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 to exempt issuers with a total market capitalization of less than $2,000,000,000 from the auditor attestation requirement for internal control assessments.
